description: Continued fraction for square root of (Pi * e / 2).
references: C. A. Pickover, "Wonders of Numbers, Adventures in Mathematics, Mind and Meaning," Oxford University Press, Oxford and NY, 2001, page 68.
links: Harry J. Smith, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..20000
C. A. Pickover, "Wonders of Numbers, Adventures in Mathematics, Mind and Meaning," Zentralblatt review
prog: (PARI) { allocatemem(932245000); default(realprecision, 21000); x=contfrac(sqrt(Pi*exp(1)/2)); for (n=1, 20000, write("b059445.txt", n, " ", x[n])); } \\ _Harry J. Smith_, Jun 27 2009
author: _Robert G. Wilson v_, Feb 01 2001
